issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
For cross platform consistency we need to display the AudioPlayer progress in seconds instead of milliseconds.  

Android Screen Shot: http://screencast.com/t/nMZzKcRg4
iOS Screen Shot: http://screencast.com/t/cdTMg9Vg0mr

For testing use Kitchensink>Phone>Sounds>Remote Streaming (KS Stream url seems to be broken so use: http://watoo.net:8000/INTRODUCTION.mp3)

HD Ticket Reference: http://appc.me/c/APP-964699
fields.summary: AudioPlayer Progress is in milliseconds (iOS is Seconds)
